The Last of Us 2 represents how games sh: Ok so.... i kinda had this game spoiled for me like a lot of other people\, and went into it not knowing what my reaction would be until it happened!!! Then that moment came and I felt so many emotions i may have even had tears in my eyes?! How did it make me feel.... I didn’t review bomb the game.I didn’t cut my discs in half and post it online.I didn’t throw my toys out the pram and tell everyone else not to play.I acted like an adult and carried on charged up on all sorts of emotions hell bent on revenge wanting to blast through anyone and anything to avenge Joel...This game truly is a masterpiece... of storytelling of design and you can see the love and care that has been poured into every heart breaking attention to detail.That Birthday trip to the Museum was amazing the love between those two characters is so perfectly clear to see.Play the game and be ready to feel your opinions and feelings be blown all over the place.The Last of Us part 2 stands shoulder to shoulder with its predecessor as the greatest games of all time In my opinion of course… Expand
